text: You can add much of the these but it will require either serverless functions through CMS enterprise or  VM support from any other provider
I can do with serverless but how it can be achievable and how that will be stored in HubSpot comment form? can you please explain me more in detail
Last time I checked, did not seem like could be done with any blog properties by overriding them, so the best option would be to use HubDb to store everything corresponding to a blog post id
